The decisions of the Supreme Court have a profound impact on the rights and lives of all Americans. The rulings of one justice can have consequences for generations. It’s imperative we actively work to ensure women’s reproductive rights and health care are protected under the law

President Trump made clear that he had a litmus test for Supreme Court Justices—overturn Roe v. Wade. Brett Kavanaugh was selected because he passed that litmus test. Pay attention. A woman’s right to make her own decisions about her body and her future is at stake.
